languages.text: {n}Из горла Соломона вырывается сдавленный рык, Глейто щерится, его визоры лихорадочно мигают.{/n} "Да сколько же вас, мразей, мне еще придется..."
{n}A stifled roar escapes Solomorne's throat, and Glaito bares his teeth, his lumens flickering wildly.{/n} "How many more of you bastards must I..."
languages.original_text: {n}Из горла Соломона вырывается сдавленный рык, Глейто щерится, его визоры лихорадочно мигают.{/n} "Да сколько же вас, мразей, мне еще придется..."

{n}A stifled roar escapes Solomorne's throat, and Glaito bares his teeth, his lumens flickering wildly.{/n} "How many more of you bastards must I..."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的喉咙里发出了压抑的咆哮声，格雷托露出了尖牙，流明灯疯狂地闪烁着。{/n}“你们这些该死的渣滓，我到底还要……”
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled roar escapes Solomorne's throat, and Glaito bares his teeth, his lumens flickering wildly.{/n} "How many more of you bastards must I..."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的喉咙里发出了压抑的咆哮声，格雷托露出了尖牙，流明灯疯狂地闪烁着。{/n}“你们这些该死的渣滓，我到底还要……”

languages.text: {n}Un rugido ahogado escapa de la garganta de Solomorne y Glaito enseña los dientes mientras sus lumens parpadean frenéticamente.{/n} «¿A cuántos más de vosotros tengo que...?».
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled roar escapes Solomorne's throat, and Glaito bares his teeth, his lumens flickering wildly.{/n} "How many more of you bastards must I..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rugido ahogado escapa de la garganta de Solomorne y Glaito enseña los dientes mientras sus lumens parpadean frenéticamente.{/n} «¿A cuántos más de vosotros tengo que...?».

languages.text: {n}Un grognement contenu échappe de la bouche de Solomorne, et Glaito retrousse les babines, ses lumens clignotant avec fureur.{/n} « Combien d'autres bâtards comme vous je vais devoir... »
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled roar escapes Solomorne's throat, and Glaito bares his teeth, his lumens flickering wildly.{/n} "How many more of you bastards must I..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un grognement contenu échappe de la bouche de Solomorne, et Glaito retrousse les babines, ses lumens clignotant avec fureur.{/n} « Combien d'autres bâtards comme vous je vais devoir... »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの喉から抑えきれない咆哮が漏れた。グライトは牙をむき出しにし、眼光が激しく揺らめいた。{/n}「お前らクソ野郎をあと何人…」
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled roar escapes Solomorne's throat, and Glaito bares his teeth, his lumens flickering wildly.{/n} "How many more of you bastards must I..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの喉から抑えきれない咆哮が漏れた。グライトは牙をむき出しにし、眼光が激しく揺らめいた。{/n}「お前らクソ野郎をあと何人…」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un boğazından boğuk bir kükreyiş sıyrılıyor, lümenleri çılgınca yanıp sönen Glaito da dişlerini gösteriyor.{/n} "Daha kaç tane senin gibi şerefsizi..."
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled roar escapes Solomorne's throat, and Glaito bares his teeth, his lumens flickering wildly.{/n} "How many more of you bastards must I..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un boğazından boğuk bir kükreyiş sıyrılıyor ve Glaito dişlerini çıkarıyor, lümenleri çılgınca yanıp sönüyor.{/n} "Daha kaç tane senin gibi şerefsizi..."

languages.text: {n}Ein unterdrücktes Brüllen entringt sich Solomornes Kehle, und Glaito fletscht die Zähne, seine Lumen flackern wild.{/n} "Wie viele von euch Mistkerlen muss ich ...?"
languages.original_text: {n}A stifled roar escapes Solomorne's throat, and Glaito bares his teeth, his lumens flickering wildly.{/n} "How many more of you bastards must I..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein unterdrücktes Brüllen entringt sich Solomornes Kehle, und Glaito fletscht die Zähne, seine Lumen flackern wild.{/n} "Wie viele von euch Mistkerlen muss ich ...?"
